subject: Tasty pills
body:
Don't want to expose your private life? 
Everything for your health
You can spend thousands and buy pills at your local drug store. But you can spend less by ordering the same quality Viagra and Cialis at Online pharmaceuticals.
Go to the shop
Pay less and get the licensed medications you are looking for. 
With best regards,
Alexander Silva
 
 
No dumaiu, eto budet ne tak. I moiu sudbu tozhe. O tom, chto tot sdelal s traktirshchikom. Ne hvatalo mne eshche problem s hoziainom tvoego novogo priiatelia, paren. 
Srazhenie bylo korotkim i zhestokim. Snova donessia gromovoj raskat. Giblye Zemli. Takih vo vsej Federacii bylo raz, dva i obchelsia, i obychno oni ne afishirovali svoih Sposobnostej ili prosto ne bralis za podobnye avantiury. Ia uvidel korotkij Koridor, oblicovannyj golubym plastikom bez kakih-libo ukrashenij, Okanchivaiushchijsia dveriu lifta. Tam, gde i predpolagal, za Porogom, gde ranshe obital Strazh. Navernoe, nakonec nachal privykat, chto chuzhoj Mozhet mnogoe iz togo, chto ne po silam obychnomu cheloveku i chto obiasnit na Pervyj vzgliad nevozmozhno. Tak, slushaj menia vnimatelno, magik, strogo skazal Gilsveri, i Malchishka zamer, predanno gliadia emu v lico i ispytyvaia chto-to vrode Blagogoveniia. 
Ia ne zadumyvalsia, kak eto u Menia poluchaetsia, prosto delal neobhodimuiu rabotu po zachistke poverhnosti Planety. Tut est o chem zadumatsia, Niks, ne pravda li? ona torzhestvuiushche Ulybnulas. Trasser povedu ia sama, tak chto derzhis, ia Liubliu prokatitsia s veterkom. Niksard prisel pered golovoj charsa i Polozhil emu ladon na sheiu. ejisuminyon VVFcRlhQUVh0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
